title: For Elvis Mitchell, Critic Turned Filmmaker, a Chance to Show and Tell
description: His new documentary on Netflix, “Is That Black Enough for You?!?,” spotlights unsung Black cinema of the 1970s.
dc:creator: Reggie Ugwu
category: Is That Black Enough For You?!? (Movie)
media:credit: Simbarashe Cha for The New York Times
media:description: “We hear about Blaxploitation as if that’s the sole definition of movies that came out at the time,” Elvis Mitchell said. “But that’s reductive and just not true.”
